name: Risky Striker
text: You can make yourself a little more vulnerable to larger creatures in order to land a devastating blow.
benefit: You can choose to take a –1 penalty to AC to gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls against creatures two or more size categories larger than you. When your base attack bonus reaches +4 and every 4 levels thereafter, the penalty increases by -1 and the damage bonus increases by 2. The bonus damage is multiplied in the case of a critical hit. You can only choose to use this feat when you declare that you are making an attack action or a full-attack action with a melee weapon. The effects last until your next turn.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to gain the bonus on damage rolls against creatures one or more size categories larger than you. This benefit ends when you stop using this feat or after 1 minute, whichever comes first.
text_zh: 你为了对大型敌人造成巨创而把自己放在了危险的境地。
benefit_zh: 在与比你大至少2个体型的敌人战斗时，你在近战攻击时可以选择承受-1AC减值而得到+2伤害加值。当你的基本攻击加值达到+4以及以后的每4个基本攻击加值等级时，AC再额外-1而这个伤害加值额外增加2。你只有在近战攻击和全回合攻击之前宣布使用这个专长。专长效果持续到你的下一回合开始。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在对抗比你至少大一个体型的生物时获得伤害骰上的加值。这个好处在你停止使用这个专长或者1分钟后结束，以先到来的来结算。
